alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Lee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lee and southern Chambers Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beans Mill, or near Valley, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Opelika, Valley, Lanett, La Fayette, Lakeview, Cusseta, Chambers County Lake, Beulah, Beans Mill, Huguley, Fairfax, River View, Sturkie, Oak Bowery, West Chambers, Lanett Municipal Airport, I 85 Welcome Center At Lanett and Mount Jefferson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
